name: Talk Knight
_source: s;SoldierBlue;You must be the one Titus told us about.
s;Simon;We'd really appreciate your help in Vesner's tomb.

s;SoldierBlue;We should be thanking you.{w}{br}Those bandits really did a number on our troops.{w}{br}And monsters have been attacking our convoy at night.{w}{br}We've lost some good men and women the past few days.
s;Simon;Why not retreat and bolster your forces?
s;SoldierBlue;Courage has really died out nowadays.
s;SoldierBlue;Look, kid, this is a medal from one of our soldiers who died in a bandit attack two days ago.{w}{br}Think retreat ever crossed his mind?
s;SoldierBlue;I ask that you take this and think on the meaning of courage before we proceed.
